sheets - github-powered prompt engineering

sheets transforms github repositories into beautiful, AI-generated markdown documents perfect for LLM context. analyze any codebase, discover patterns, and create reusable prompt templates.

key features

üîç deep repository analysis

  • comprehensive architecture overview
  • security audits and vulnerability detection
  • pattern extraction and best practices
  • improvement suggestions
  • learning guides from real code
  • comparison with your coding style

üîó github integration

  • connect your github account
  • analyze private repositories
  • browse all your repos instantly
  • discover similar projects

üìÑ sheets management

  • save analyses as "sheets"
  • beautiful markdown formatting
  • copy to clipboard for LLM context
  • download as markdown files
  • share via links (coming soon)

üéØ context-aware analysis

  • upload your coding standards
  • reference files with #tags
  • personalized recommendations
  • consistent with your practices

getting started

1. connect github (optional)

click "connect github" to analyze private repos and save your sheets. you can still analyze public repos without connecting.

2. analyze a repository

enter any github URL or repo name (owner/repo) and choose an analysis type:

  • overview & architecture - comprehensive project analysis
  • security audit - vulnerability and security review
  • patterns & practices - extract reusable patterns
  • improvement suggestions - actionable recommendations
  • learning resources - educational guide from the code
  • compare with my code - see how it differs from your style

3. use context files

upload your coding standards, architecture docs, or style guides in the context section. reference them in any analysis with #tags.

4. manage your sheets

all your analyses are saved as sheets. copy them directly into any LLM conversation for instant context about codebases.

use cases

for learning

analyze popular open source projects to understand their architecture and patterns. generate learning guides that explain complex codebases.

for code reviews

run security audits and best practice checks on any repository. get actionable suggestions for improvements.

for development

extract patterns from well-built projects. discover how others solve similar problems. find libraries and tools worth adopting.

for LLM workflows

generate perfect context documents for AI assistants. each sheet is optimized for LLM consumption with clear structure and relevant details.

tips & tricks

  • use specific analysis types for focused results
  • upload your team's coding standards for consistent recommendations
  • analyze competitor repos to understand their approach
  • save sheets as templates for repeated analyses
  • combine multiple sheets for comprehensive project context

keyboard shortcuts

  • cmd/ctrl + enter - run analysis
  • # - trigger context file autocomplete
  • cmd/ctrl + k - quick search (coming soon)

privacy & security

your sheets and context files are private to your account. repository analysis happens server-side with secure API access. we never store repository code - only the generated analysis.

open source

sheets is built with cloudflare workers, pages, and D1. view the source on github.
